title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5108.4 - Employee reporting and record keeping requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5108.4 - Employee reporting and record keeping requirements

State Regulations

Each video lottery gaming agent shall maintain a
complete, accurate and current record of each employee in a form required by
the commission and each video lottery gaming agent shall file such active and
terminated employee reports with the commission by electronic data transfer
monthly as prescribed by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5108.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
